name: azure-devops-branch-helper
title: Azure Devops Helper
description: Fetch Azure DevOps work items and generate standardized Git branch names
author: tor_gjosaeter

commands.name: branchname
commands.title: Generate Branch Name
commands.description: Convert task description to branch name format

commands.name: activate-and-branch
commands.title: Activate and Branch Work Item
commands.description: Set work item to active, assign to self, and create branch

commands.name: check-workitem
commands.title: Check Work Item
commands.description: View work item details and get URLs without making changes

commands.name: list-my-workitems
commands.title: List My Work Items
commands.description: View all work items assigned to you (Tasks, User Stories, Bugs, Features, etc.)

commands.name: list-backlog
commands.title: List Backlog
commands.description: Browse backlog items with pagination (8 items per page)

commands.name: list-builds
commands.title: List Builds
commands.description: View active and recent builds with live log streaming

commands.name: list-pull-requests
commands.title: List Pull Requests
commands.description: View pull requests where you are the author or reviewer

commands.name: create-user-story
commands.title: Create User Story
commands.description: Create a new user story with title, description, tag, feature, and assignee

preferences.name: branchPrefix
preferences.title: Branch Prefix
preferences.description: The prefix to use for branch names (e.g., 'tor/', 'feature/')

preferences.name: azureOrganization
preferences.title: Azure DevOps Organization URL
preferences.description: Your Azure DevOps organization URL (e.g., https://dev.azure.com/myorg)

preferences.name: azureProject
preferences.title: Azure DevOps Project (Optional)
preferences.description: Default project name - will auto-detect from work item if not specified

preferences.name: azureRepository
preferences.title: Azure DevOps Repository (Optional)
preferences.description: Repository name for branch operations - defaults to project name if not specified

preferences.name: sourceBranch
preferences.title: Source Branch
preferences.description: The branch to create new branches from

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
